ModMetaData.name: RePower VGP Patch
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Patches Vegetable Garden workbenches for using the RePower system:
Electric Oven (50W Idle, 1250W Active) Food Prep Table (10W Idle, 750W Active) Sweets Table (10W Idle, 400W Active) Electric Loom (10W Idle, 500W Active)
